item.title: How Hugo Setup action works
item.description: It’s really easy to host your Hugo site on GitHub, and GitHub Actions for Hugo makes deploy a breeze. And this is how it’s works. Flow diagram |files| /archetypes, /content, /static, /themes, config.toml| -+ [branch] main] -> (trigger) Build) | * |files| /assets, /categories, /img, /page, /tags, index.html, 404.html, index.xml, sitemap.xml| | + [branch] gh-pages] | * /site.github.io/ Notes Don’t forget to change your GitHub Pages settings to Branch: gh-pages Directory: / (root)
item.content:
It’s really easy to host your Hugo site on GitHub, and GitHub Actions for Hugo makes deploy a breeze. And this is how it’s works.

Flow diagram

|files| /archetypes, /content, /static, /themes, config.toml| -+ [branch] main] -> (trigger) Build)
|
*
|files| /assets, /categories, /img, /page, /tags, index.html, 404.html, index.xml, sitemap.xml|
|
+
[branch] gh-pages]
|
*
/site.github.io/

Notes

Don’t forget to change your GitHub Pages settings to

  • Branch: gh-pages
  • Directory: / (root)
